allow: Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Write-Host ''Test 1: No parameter''; & ''.\doy_calculator.ps1''; Write-Host ''''; Write-Host ''Test 2: String date format''; & ''.\doy_calculator.ps1'' -inputDate ''January 1, 2024''; Write-Host ''''; Write-Host ''Test 3: Pipeline''; [datetime]''2024-02-29'' | & ''.\doy_calculator.ps1''")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$help = Get-Help ''.\doy_calculator.ps1'' -Detailed 2>&1 | Out-String; if ($help -match ''SYNOPSIS'') { Write-Output ''Help works: FOUND'' } else { Write-Output ''Help failed: NOT_FOUND'' }")

Bash(powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Write-Host ''Test 1: No args''; & ''.\doy_calculator.ps1''; Write-Host ''''; Write-Host ''Test 2: Valid date''; & ''.\doy_calculator.ps1'' -inputDate ''2024-01-01''; Write-Host ''''; Write-Host ''Test 3: Invalid date''; & ''.\doy_calculator.ps1'' -inputDate ''xyz123''")
